{"step_by_step_thinking": "Netrin-1 is a secreted protein. It is a member of the netrin family of proteins, which are known to be secreted and play important roles in axon guidance and cell migration during development. Netrin-1 is synthesized as a precursor protein and then cleaved to produce the mature, active form that is secreted into the extracellular space.", "answer_choice": "A"}
